subject: Re: One from ghostman
author: Lance Oliver
full_text:
Hola Frank!

In a nutshell I'd say it's all about the the worst four letter word 
of the english language - Fear.

If you couple that with some people's perceived loss of control over 
the minds and hearts of others, not to mention cutting their profits, 
it's no stretch of the imagination to see those sort of discussions 
for what they are. 

I've read and studied ITC for many years. I've long waited for some 
device, like my friend Ron's now making, to come along for me to 
actually experiment with. If anything, ITC research points out the  
grantedly subjective need for cooperation and harmony among 
researchers, which I've heard is due to the higher levels of 
vibration in the dimension some go to after this life.

Just find your own place within of peace and tranquility. Bozo's like 
him only have as much voice and power as we ourselves give them. But 
if you really want to mentally slap onery folks like that, why not 
ask them if they're planning another Salem Witch Trial. We all should 
know just how badly that is now seen, not to mention that Salem's now 
witch central of the planet. Law of attraction in action!

My dream is to help in some way to build a bridge of communication 
with the otherside, so the agony and anguish of loosing love ones can 
be ended forever. Life is eternal!

Keep up the good work Frank, Ron and everyone else!!

Lance

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> 
wrote:
>
> 
>  I'm torqued again! I was told yesterday by ------if ya believe

your bishop, and shove 'em.    My apoplogies to the group, but I know 
this will get forwarded, and this bozo finds me so easy to dismiss, 
that normal e-mail would be useless.   I had to cut some out for nice 
sakes.   Frank-S
